name: Ch14BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Duessel;The time has come for us to face the truth about Grado.
speak;Duessel;I've served King Vigarde loyally for many years.|But the man who sits on the throne now...|He is not the king I knew.
speak;Natasha;I've noticed the same.|His Majesty was once a kind and just ruler.|But now...his ruling seems cruel and senseless.
speak;Duessel;Something has changed him.|He no longer listens to reason, shows no emotion...|It's as if he's become merely a shell of himself.
speak;Amelia;I joined the Grado army because I believed in our king.|I wanted to serve him...to protect our people.
speak;Amelia;But this war...|These senseless attacks...|This isn't what I signed up for.
speak;Cormag;We all feel the same way.|But what choice do we have now?|We can't simply abandon our homeland.
speak;Duessel;I believe there may be a way to stop him without bloodshed.|If we can reach him...speak to him directly...|Perhaps we can find what's causing this change.
speak;Natasha;Do you truly believe that's possible, General Duessel?
speak;Duessel;I have to believe it.|The Vigarde I knew would never order such atrocities.|Something else must be controlling his actions.
speak;Cormag;I'm willing to try.|But there's something else troubling me.
speak;Cormag;What of my brother, Glen?|He's still loyal to the crown.|What if we have to face him in battle?
speak;Duessel;Glen is a man of honor.|If he sees what we've seen...|Understands what we understand...|I believe he will join our cause.
speak;Cormag;But what if he doesn't?|What if he stands against us?|Could you raise your lance against your own student, General?
speak;Duessel;That is a bridge we must cross when we come to it.
speak;Duessel;For now, we focus on reaching the king.
speak;Amelia;I'll follow you, General Duessel.|If there's any chance to save our king...|To save Grado...|I want to be part of it.
speak;Natasha;The Everlasting watches over us.|I pray we can resolve this without further bloodshed.
speak;Duessel;Then it's settled.|We make for Castle Grado at dawn.|Our mission is clear.|Reach the king and try to reason with him.|We must discover what dark force has taken hold of him.
speak;Cormag;And if we can't reason with him?
speak;Duessel;Then we'll face that moment when it comes.|But for now, hold onto hope.|The Vigarde I know is still in there somewhere.
speak;Cormag;Very well.|For Grado's sake, I hope you're right.
speak;Natasha;May the light guide our path.
speak;Amelia;For a peaceful Grado.|For the true King Vigarde.
